comments:
please see the msg and the replys here on the gtk-devel-list:
http://mail.gnome.org/archives/gtk-devel-list/2003-November/msg00031.html

Eclipse-2.x GTK version won't work with the next gtk+ version. Maybe due to 

> Some people were accessing GtkToolbar private data and internal
> structure in ways we found impossible to support. The GTK+ port of
> Emacs did this. Also Glade.


Will this get fixed in a future 2.x or 3.x releases?
